评论概述: Great little bag - fits everything, good quality
评论详情: Love this bag! I get a lot of compliments on it, quality is great, and it easily fits my phone, wallet, keys and sunglasses.

This purse isn’t what I thought it’d be. Very difficult to unzip and open the flap. Hmm, can’t seem to apply the straps easily. I thought there’d be hardware for the straps but you connect them to the leather straps around the handle. Very odd. The leather is nice. It is cute. Could keep it as a makeup bag but that’s not why I bought it. Returning it. Also, very small holding capacity especially since the top flap doesn’t fully open. I see what they were going for but not well executed. Save your money and effort.
It is smaller than I expected . The color is so pretty
I’m simply obsessed with this purse and that’s all
Love love love! Have in many colors
The quality could be better, the strap keeps coming undone and you have to screw it back in. Not really big enough for anything but my phone and glasses.
Muy satisfecha

I think this is a great dupe. Yes it’s annoying sometimes to zip one handed so I have to hold the bag in one hand to zip. But the quality is good and doesn’t feel cheap. Fits my phone, key holder, card case, mini brush and lip gloss. The strap wasn’t hard to figure out. It was bent a little but I just put my stuff in it to weigh it down and hung it on a hanger to try to straighten and it worked.
I am obsessed with this back. I got it off the recommendation of a friend and it’s so cute and charming. I prefer to use the handle and not the strap. Wish there was a gold hardware option.
I wanted small bag to wear around my waist. It does that or crossbody, but a little to small. It only holds my cell thats in a case & a tiny 3" long coin purse. Still very pretty.
Love this style bag! It’s so classy. It’s the perfect size to fit a phone, keys and some makeup. It comes with a strap so it can worn with it or without.

Received this bag and the clasp on the strap was broken, so I requested a replacement. The replacement arrived and had the same exact problem in the same exact spot. Thinking they didn’t replace the bag and just resent me the original defective product.
Me gustó todo

评论概述: There is not a strap for the crossbody function
评论详情: If you’re looking for a versatile bag to wear a few different ways this is not it. The strap that is included does not work for a crossbody function. What am I suppose to do with that extra worthless strap?

评论概述: What you see is what you get
评论详情: Good quality. Love the color.
This bag is perfect. The color is a true brown and the suede is supple and soft. I’m going to treat the bag to make sure it doesn’t get messed up in the rain.
It’s a great size and quality to bring on my trip. Down side is the reviews are correct, extremely difficult to get the crossbody strap attached.

评论概述: Quality products and great customer service.
评论详情: Quality products and great customer service.
Returned it too small!!!
Super Cute, simple and not to bulky
Great color totally trending !
I love it. It’s a bit smaller than what I expected, but overall appearance is great. The color is exquisite and the texture of the bag feels expensive tho it’s not that expensive. Good finds indeed.

This is a great light pink bag. I saw it at NM in different colors. Great dupe! Looks just like the real one at 900.00.  I use it all the time. Has enough room for my small wallet and lipstick , keys and cell  phone. Great quality and looks and feels just like real leather.
I bought this because the one that it is fashioned by is so pricey.  This little bag is cute and does the job.  Definitely a great purchase for the price
Producto muy bonito,  diseño único color perfecto para combinar con atuendo para ocasión,  producto de calidad cuero

Leather feels nice, it’s smaller than I expected but also I never seen the real one in real life so I can’t compare. It’s big enough to hold my phone, card holder, keys, hand sanitizer, lipticks. Looks cute for dressing up! Might get another color.
Clasp on the strap broke the first time I used it.

I am truly impressed by the overall quality of this little bag.  The color is gorgeous and exactly as described, the zipper and crossbody handle hardware is excellent quality and work perfectly - usually this makes or breaks a dupe.  Very happy and looking forward to wearing this trendy fall color.

The actual bag is cute but the fancy clasps that the strap is supposed to attach to the bag with we’re not like the ones shown I the pics/videos. They were just open regular lobster clasps, so it was harder to hook the strap into the handle of the handbag itself. Other than that the leather quality is actually really nice.

评论概述: Cute and holds all you need for travel
评论详情: My wife took this on our recent trip. Holds all you need for short trips on the flight. No inside pockets but if you want a one or two items of cosmetics, phone and credit card pouch this works well.
Very happy with this purchase! Well made mini bag. You can fit your phone, small wallet or card holder and miscellaneous small items such as lipsticks, lotion, keys, and more. Great buy!

评论概述: It's Ok, Just Hard to Use
评论详情: The size of the crossbody bag is great, the materials were ok, and the overall look of the bag was fine. It's a bit pricey for what you get, so my advice is to shop around.  I did not like actually using the bag because it was cumbersome & difficult. The zippered opening was on the smaller size and oddly shaped. This made it awakward and I had to fiddle too much when storing or removing my (normal size) mobile phone. If I have a do-over I would not purchase this item.

评论概述: New clasp does not fit bag
评论详情: The bag itself is pretty nice. the leather feels nice and there’s no smell. I received the strap with the new clasp and it does NOT fit the top handle at all!!! i’m a little disappointed because i wanted to wear it as a cross body

评论概述: Strap is weird and does NOT work
评论详情: I am returning because I could not figure out the strap. It seemed broken?
The metal secure clasp on the cross body strap completely fell apart. The “leather” is peeling off along the sides and bottoms. Disappointed. Don’t buy if you want it to last more than 2 months.

Update: They are sending me a new strap! Good dupe, but this is a micro bag...more like a wallet. I will use this as a phone bag or lipstick pouch.  Cute bag but the strap clasps wouldn't open. It was like they were glued shut. I tried every tool in my toolbox but they wouldn't budge. Can't contact the seller. No responses.

I recently picked up this adorable little bag, and I have to say, it’s a fantastic dupe! The quality is surprisingly good for the price; the material feels sturdy, and it definitely looks more high-end than it actually is.  What I love most is how versatile it is. It pairs perfectly with just about any outfit, whether I’m dressing up for a night out or keeping it casual for brunch with friends. It’s the perfect size, too! I can easily fit my cardholder, phone, and keys without feeling cramped.  The only downside I’ve found is the strap. There’s really no good place to hook it, which makes it a bit awkward for crossbody wear. However, it’s super cute as a handheld bag or clutch, so it’s not a dealbreaker for me.  Overall, I highly recommend this bag if you’re looking for something stylish and affordable!
The strap you get with the bag has nowhere to attach it to the bag. The strap is what makes it a Crossbody Bag. Without the strap it’s useless.

My expectations for a bag purchased on amazon was low but i was leaving for a trip and needed something in a pinch. I am so impressed and pleasantly surprised by this bag! the leather feels high quality, amazing value for the money and is super cute / stylish, i love the versatility of using a as a clutch or a cross body bag.
Love the purse but first time I put the strap on the latch broke on it. No option to carry it with a strap!
This is such a great find! It looks just like a high end designer dupe. Would definitely recommend! I bought the elephant grey and it’s the perfect nude bag for the Fall season.
This bag is cute for a petite person. Love the texture and color. I’m 5’7” with a small frame. Still feel it’s not right for my size. Opening is also small.

评论概述: Cute but pricy for a cheap item
评论详情: It’s a cute little purse with a cute design.  But it is very cheaply made.  Way overpriced at almost $40.  Should be about $7.99.
A gift that she loved
Great quality and super soft.  Looks just like the Lori Piana bag similar for several thousand.  Would buy again!

Not bad for the price. Looks very close to Loro Piana bags. I cant say how long they last since I just received, but I’m sure with time the color will rub as this is stated to be “faux leather” in the description. For it being fake leather, it’s very soft & bendable if that makes sense. The material isn’t stiff! It comes with a crossbody but I like it more as a top handle bag! This is meant to be petite so not much can fit. I got the cream “white” color, elephant grey and yellow which is darker in person. I saw some reviews saying that the zipper is hard to close sometimes and I agree with that but I don’t think it’s a quality issue, I think the bag itself is shaped in a way that even top quality zippers will be hard to close/open. It’s basically a sideways zipper lol.  So far I don't mind spending $100 on these three bags, will update with usage about quality!  Update: After many months of use especially out at bars, get this bag! It is so durable, I’ve spilt already so much on them and they wash/clean up so well. No fading to the color, no rubbing. I get so many compliments on them everywhere I go!
Very cute bag

My taste and clothing tends to lean more on the designer side. I say this because I'm thoroughly impressed by the quality! I purchased this purse to match an outfit last min, thinking I would never wear this color (yellow) again and who cares at this price point. Although I might not wear this often (due to the color), I have zero regrets. This is defiantly a deal! I may jazz it up with some nice charms to give it a little something more though.

I was happy to see that it was well made, the grain leather, the stitching was all perfectly aligned. I understand that the metal part of the strap probably kept braking so they decided to go with a different clasp all together. The original clasp was definitely a detail that made the bag special and stayed true to the design of the actual bag. They should have tried to kept  the original claps and improved the quality.
Wow how cute! She’s small but perfect. Great for a day out when all you need is your phone, lipstick and wallet. Will be purchasing more colors. Material is very nice as well!
Purse is super cute. I wore it once with a black dress and it was stain within 30min of it being against the dress. I tried wiping it with wipes and nothing
This bag quality is great however, after 3 months of having it the zipper broke. Really bummed about this! I don’t put much in it at all and so not sure how it broke.
We’re going out of town and I was hopeful this would work. Alas the zipper is awkward and there are no interior pockets. The color was exactly what I was looking for so I hated to return it.
Funny story with this bag I was going to return it because I found it to be too tiny but my granddaughter who is 15 years old loved it so I gave it to her.
Love this! Me and my friend went twinning for this. So chic and fashionable.
Most compliments and great quality - the only thing that isnt my fave is the strap so I just carry in hand using the smaller strap!
I really like this small back it fit just the basics

I got this little bag based on a recommendation and WOW... Chic and trendy.  The material is good and it fits my cellphone, card holder, lip product, brush, compressed face powder, and house keys perfectly.
I returned this (tiny) bag almost 4 months ago!! It took forever to arrive and now it’s taking FOREVER to receive my refund! Why the delay? I’d never purchase anything from this business again!

Great quality bag - understated and perfect dupe - threw on a scarf to dress it up. Great value for price point

评论概述: Super cute, leather feels soft and supple, BUT

Off the bat though, I can tell that the hook isn’t the strongest hardware so I recommend being realistic and managing your own expectations by not placing 15lbs worth of stuff in the bag or doing rigorous activities and then expecting the chain not to break. Like you get what you pay for; people need on here to need to be for real lol.

The purse is small but has an open space for carrying items. I also like that it has a long strap that's actually removable and the smaller strap on it. I'm not in love with the color, its kind of hard to match. It is sooo super soft as well.

评论概述: Quality Fabric perfect for Daily Use
评论详情: I included the remote for size comparison. It is smaller than I thought but, still useful as my phone and basics all fit in the purse. Perfect for year round use especially when I don't want to use a larger bag ( which is most of the time). Strap is adjustable by 4 holes. No issues with stiching or fabric.
Good quality 👏👏👏
I bought to use as a crossbody and the strap attachment doesn’t work. Not worth buying.
Terrible quality
Small cute bag but great quality & color.
Cute bag My strap broke sooner than I would have liked. I still use it without the strap though and has been working great.
Size and quality of this purse is amazing for the price.

评论概述: Not the perfect dupe but not bad
评论详情: Great soft faux leather. Not flimsy. However the zipper can be problematic and hard to move at times. Additionally, the clasp to attach the sling is too small to be attached to the handle so it’s a bit of struggle. Taking one of star of because of the zipper & clasp problem. Otherwise, it’s a decent purse.

While I like bags that are small, the way this purse opens makes it seem smaller. It is approximately the size of a makeup bag. The zipper is on the front face and does not fold back so it is not easy to get things in and out. If you are in a crowded place (concert or bar/club) you may want that but I  don't like this for every day.I do like the top strap. It is short  and compact. The color is very close to what I  saw in my monitor.

评论概述: STRAP DOES NOT WORK on 1st order/Yellow  (2nd Updated - Navy/Yellow/Pink/Faux Ostrich Green)
评论详情: The bag is nice, but totally useless since the strap mechanism to latch and unlatch the strap to the bag does not twist & turn which makes the strap defective. I bought this bag to wear as a cross body so it is useless to me and I will be returning it...Such a disappoint after waiting nearly 2 weeks to finally receive it.  The negative reviews about the strap is amounting and concerning...The seller/manufacturer needs to give these negative reviews attention to fix the problems.  I am returning the 1st order for this bag and purchased it again on 7/11/24 and received the 2nd bag in yellow today on 7/14/24, hoping that the strap mechanism would work and I'm happy to report that it does work fine. The bag is cute and the faux leather feels soft. The only other thing I want to mention is that some colors have an inside slit pocket...I have this bag in Navy and it has an inside pocket which enables me to put credit cards some cash & coin to save on space so I don't need to carry a wallet. This color Yellow and I also purchased it in Pink, Faux Ostrich Green does not come with the slit pocket...To the seller...this little slit pocket is a game changer and would be a great feature for ALL colors.
I love this bag, the size is perfect and the quality is incredible...100x100 recommend..

I purchased this because I saw it on Instagram. I needed a small purse for going out. It’s perfect and really cute. You can wear it crossbody or without the strap. It took me a minute to figure out how to put the strap on and off, you turn it to the side like in the photo.
This is a great size and good for travel too. I wore it all over Europe and it held everything I needed!
The metal piece to hook the strap on is broken
Great little linen and brown leather bag. Can carry as a clutch or has a long adjustable brown strap. 👍
